definition: empress/refers to Tang empress Wuzetian 武則天|武则天 (624-705), reigned 690-705

sentences.english: In ancient times, dragons and phoenixes were used as the symbols of emperors and empresses.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，龍和鳳被用作皇帝和女皇的標誌圖案。

sentences.english: The empress expected everyone to bow and scrape to her.
sentences.chinese: 這位女皇要求人人都要對她打躬作揖。

sentences.english: In London pilgert man zur Queen.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦，人們可以去朝拜女皇。

sentences.english: The crowning of the May Day Queen was often the centre of celebrations.
sentences.chinese: 五月女皇加冕禮是整個慶祝活動的核心部分。

sentences.english: This is because the British Queen Victoria wore a white wedding dress elegant.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲英國的維多利亞女皇穿着優雅的白色婚紗。

sentences.english: The ladies who ruled the roost at Almack's were the de-fact queens of London society.
sentences.chinese: 掌管集中營臥室的女士們確實就是倫敦社會的女皇。

sentences.english: And Cleopatra Night drinks all. 'Tis done.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜埃及女皇舉杯暢飲。

sentences.english: But in reality she is only a figure-head.
sentences.chinese: 但是實際上女皇僅僅是傀儡。

sentences.english: The Queen is Edward III's great-granddaughter, 17 times removed.
sentences.chinese: 現任女皇正是愛德華三世相隔17代的孫女。

sentences.english: With you as educational czar or czarina, feedback becomes your friend and guide.
sentences.chinese: 你作爲教育沙皇或女皇，回饋將變成你的朋友和導師。

sentences.english: Prince William has informed The Queen and other close members of his family.
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子已經告知了英國女皇還有其他家庭成員。

sentences.english: Qiao Zhi commands each killer distributings to undertake assassinate everywhere to what visit in empress.
sentences.chinese: 喬志命令各殺手分佈在女皇到訪之各處進行行刺。

sentences.english: I met the Quenn of our class, guess what?
sentences.chinese: 我今天見到我們班女皇了，你猜怎麼樣？

sentences.english: My lucky charm is a humble penny with a stretched image of Queen Mary.
sentences.chinese: 我的幸運硬幣是刻有瑪麗女皇頭像的一個便士。

sentences.english: The Queen's University is a university located in Ontario Province, the ancient medical doctoral University.
sentences.chinese: 女皇大學是一所位於安大略省的古老的醫博類大學。

sentences.english: She is a sycomore fig - queen of Africa's trees.
sentences.chinese: 埃及無花果，誠爲樹女皇。

definition: royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
